<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.Ex1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}A_{11}&A_{12}\\

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}F_{1}\\
F_{2}\end{array}\right)=-B^{-1}.\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}E_{1}\\
E_{2}\end{array}\right)," display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable columnspacing="5pt" displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mtd><mtd/></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mtd><mtd/></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>-</mo><msup><mi>B</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable columnspacing="5pt" displaystyle="true" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mtd><mtd/></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="center"><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mtd><mtd/></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo></mrow></math>
